item.title: About
item.description: My name is Callum. I work as a software developer in distributed systems and observability, currently at Grafana Labs where I contribute to Prometheus and Cortex. I also organize the Vancouver Go meetup. This site is a collection of posts, mostly software related, written to have some sort of record of my progress and knowledge.
